title: Trump Revises Stance on Ukraine, Backs Territory Reclaim with NATO Support
snippets: Last month, President Trump said Ukraine needed to be open to giving up some of its territory in peace talks with Russia. But those talks haven't happened. Now, he says Ukraine could win it all back.
The US president says Ukraine can win back land with support from Nato and Europe, marking a major shift in his position.
Trump previously said both Kyiv and Moscow would have to cede land to end Europe's deadliest war since World War II.

US President Donald Trump said that with "time, patience, and the financial support of Europe and, in particular, NATO," Ukraine could regain its territory from Russia, who he said had been fighting "aimlessly."

<a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiekFVX3lxTE9ISERQbzZDaV96TXlsaXZ6NG1keUdBMnU2OTY2Rmw0SHVpdWxBZUoySUszSF9XWmFmSEdTYXdLMVRDM3p1RENCSjJyX1RQdkxQNjV3OTNnTW5EZEFSdUZxQU5UU0c1bERMSTJBd3REQlJxLW9mWWswbm1n?oc=5" target="_blank">In extraordinary shift, Trump says Ukraine can win war with Rus
US president signals change of stance and suggests Kyiv, with support from Europe and Nato, can restore its old borders
President Trump’s pivot could give him room to distance himself from a conflict that he once promised to solve in days or weeks.

US president claims Russia is in ‘big economic trouble’ as he calls for Nato countries to stop imports of Russian oil

  • US politics live – latest updates</
titles: Trump, in major shift, suggests Ukraine can win back territory long held by Russia
Kyiv can win all of Ukraine back from Russia, Trump says
In major shift, Trump says Ukraine can win back all territory from Russia
Trump says Ukraine can regain territory lost to Russia since 2022
In extraordinary shift, Trump says Ukraine can win war with Russia - Axios
Trump says Ukraine can win back all of its territory seized by Russia
In a Sudden Shift, Trump Says Ukraine Can Win the War With Russia
Trump says he believes Ukraine can regain all land lost to Russia since 2022 invasion
summary: President Trump has shifted his stance on the conflict between Ukraine and Russia, now stating that Ukraine can reclaim its territory with support from NATO and Europe. This marks a significant change from his previous position, where he suggested both Kyiv and Moscow might need to cede land to end the conflict. Trump's updated view aligns with increased assistance for Ukraine and suggests a strategic distance from the conflict, which he once claimed he could resolve quickly. Ukrainian President Zelenskyy has expressed gratitude towards Trump for his efforts to end the war.

title: Super Typhoon Ragas Causes Barrier Lake Burst in Taiwan, 14 Dead, 124 Missing
snippets: Taiwanese authorities say 124 people are missing after barrier lake burst its banks in rural township.
Ragasa, one of the strongest storms in years, also caused major damage and injuries in Hong Kong. In southern China, more than a million people evacuated their homes ahead of its landfall.
Huge waves from Super Typhoon Ragasa — the world's most powerful tropical typhoon this year — slam into Taiwan’s remote Orchid Island.

Strong winds, rain and flooding in Hong Kong after typhoon causes lake to burst in Taiwan’s Hualien county

  • Super Typhoon Ragasa – latest upda
One million residents of Guangdong, in southern China, were evacuated. The storm left 14 dead in Taiwan.
titles: Super Typhoon Ragasa kills 14 in Taiwan, hits Hong Kong with fierce winds
Super Typhoon Ragasa leaves several dead in Taiwan
WATCH:  Huge waves from Super Typhoon Ragasa lash Taiwanese Island
Super Typhoon Ragasa: at least 14 killed in Taiwan as Hong Kong and southern China brace for impact
Typhoon Ragasa Kills 14 in Taiwan as Hong Kong Faces Strong Winds
summary: A barrier lake in Taiwan's Hualien county burst due to Super Typhoon Ragas, resulting in at least 14 deaths and 124 people missing. The typhoon also caused flooding in Hong Kong and Macau, leading to disrupted flights.

title: Man Convicted for Attempted Assassination of Trump, Faces Life Sentence
snippets: Jurors convicted Routh on five charges, including last year's attempted assassination of Trump as he golfed at his South Florida course. Routh represented himself in court and faces life in prison.
A US jury finds that Routh intended to kill then-presidential candidate Donald Trump last September.

<a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihAFBVV95cUxQdEpTbnphd2daQU16UVd1Qzg3dWpNakFRS3dldEg3LVJWbFdITUd2dVNBT3FtM1oxbGEzM25tRlI5OWtyUG1HaFgwTzB2NVZHVFVXLWNHbl9ieGhJbXNWVG9ybTU5ZXVQd1BoUVBjbVJpZVZNM1BTQXJLRlNCekpfc0lxSkc?oc=5" target="_blank">Ryan Routh found guilty in Trump assassination a
Ryan Routh, the man accused of trying to assassinate President Donald Trump on his West Palm Beach golf course last year, has been found guilty on all five counts.

Routh represented himself in trial over botched attempt on Trump’s life at West Palm Beach golf course

The man accused of trying to assassinate Donald Trump on his West Palm Beach golf course two months before Trump clinched his
titles: Jury convicts Ryan Routh on all charges in attempted assassination of Donald Trump
Ryan Routh found guilty of attempting to assassinate Trump in Florida
Ryan Routh found guilty in Trump assassination attempt - Axios
WATCH:  Ryan Routh guilty on all counts in Trump golf course assassination attempt
Ryan Routh found guilty of 2024 attempted assassination of Trump in Florida
summary: Ryan Routh was convicted on five charges, including the attempted assassination of Donald Trump at a South Florida golf course last year. Representing himself in court, Routh now faces a life sentence. The jury concluded Routh intended to kill Trump during the incident. After the verdict, Routh attempted to stab himself in the neck with a pen.

title: Italian Cinema Icon Claudia Cardinale Dies at 87
snippets: The actress, who starred in Fellini's 8 1/2, is synonymous with the golden age of Italian cinema.
Best known for her role in Federico Fellini's "8½," Cardinale has passed away after starring in over 100 productions.

The husky-voiced, chain-smoking actor had a reputation as a fiercely independent, free-spirited woman

  • Claudia Cardinale: a life in pictures

Claudia Cardinal
“It’s marvelous to live so many lives," Cardinale said. "I’ve been living more than 150 lives, totally different women.”
titles: Italian actress and star of The Leopard Claudia Cardinale dies aged 87
Italian movie star Claudia Cardinale dies at age of 87
Claudia Cardinale, glamorous star of The Leopard and Once Upon a Time in the West, dies aged 87
Claudia Cardinale, legend of Italian cinema, dies at 87
summary: Claudia Cardinale, celebrated for her role in Federico Fellini's "8½" and a symbol of the golden age of Italian cinema, has died at 87. With a career spanning over 100 productions, Cardinale was known for her husky voice, independent spirit, and significant impact on post-war cinema.

title: Jimmy Kimmel Back on TV, Defends Free Speech Amid Trump Criticism
snippets: The comedian was suspended for nearly a week by ABC's parent company, Disney, before returning to airwaves on Tuesday night.

Jimmy Kimmel was back on TV after a six-day suspension with a defense of free speech and criticism of "bullying" from the US president. Donald Trump said ABC's decision to reinstate Kimmel "puts the network in jeopardy."
Jimmy Kimmel returned to some airwaves on Tuesday night. Here's what he said.
Before Donald Trump's comments, two of the nation's largest station owners said they would not air Kimmel's show on their local stations.
titles: 'We have to speak out,' Jimmy Kimmel says in his late night return
Jimmy Kimmel returns to late night amid Trump criticism
Jimmy Kimmel took aim at Trump and the FCC chair in his emotional return to late-night
Trump railed against Jimmy Kimmel ahead of the comedian's return to late-night
summary: Jimmy Kimmel returned to television on Tuesday night after a six-day suspension by Disney, ABC's parent company. In his comeback, Kimmel defended free speech and criticized "bullying" from US President Donald Trump, who questioned ABC's decision to reinstate him, suggesting it jeopardized the network. Prior to Trump's remarks, two major station owners had announced they would not broadcast Kimmel's show on their local stations.

title: Jimmy Kimmel Back on Air; Sparks Free Speech Debate Amid Trump Lawsuit Hint
snippets: The comedian returned from a brief suspension after comments he made about the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.
Donald Trump makes veiled threat to sue ABC as comedian returns from suspension after Charlie Kirk comments

The host’s monologue noted that the suspension of his late night programme had ignited a national debate over free speech

Jimmy Kimmel returned to air on Tuesday night, calling government threats to silence comedians “anti
titles: Jimmy Kimmel calls out 'anti-American' threats to free speech in tearful TV return
Jimmy Kimmel hits out at ‘anti-American’ threats to free speech as show returns
Jimmy Kimmel says silencing comedians is ‘anti American’, as his show returns to air after suspension
summary: Comedian Jimmy Kimmel returned to his late-night show after a brief suspension due to comments made about the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. His return sparked a national debate on free speech, highlighted by his monologue. Concurrently, Donald Trump hinted at possibly suing ABC in relation to the incident. Kimmel's comeback has ignited discussions on the boundaries of free speech and the role of comedians in political discourse.

title: "Jimmy Kimmel Addresses Show's Suspension, Thanks Supporters on Return"
snippets: US TV host Jimmy Kimmel said it was ‘never his intention’ to make light of the killing of Charlie Kirk.
"Jimmy Kimmel Live!" returned to air Tuesday night, roughly one week after the late night show was suspended by Disney's ABC broadcast network.
The late-night host thanked his audience and others who spoke up against his late-night show’s suspension.
titles: Jimmy Kimmel addresses Charlie Kirk row as show returns
Jimmy Kimmel returns after ABC suspension: 'Never my intention to make light' of Charlie Kirk's murder
Jimmy Kimmel Returns: Says Charlie Kirk’s Killer Doesn’t ‘Represent Anyone’ As He Calls Out FCC Chair And Trump
summary: Jimmy Kimmel, host of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!", stated it was not his intention to trivialize the killing of Charlie Kirk. The show was suspended by ABC but resumed airing one week later. Upon return, Kimmel expressed gratitude towards his audience and supporters who opposed the suspension.

title: Flotilla to Gaza Reports Drone Attacks, Continues Mission Despite Threats
snippets: Activists on board the Global Sumud Flotilla said they heard explosions and saw drone attacks late on Tuesday.

The Global Sumud Flotilla said they would ‘not be intimidated’, after third report of drone attacks this month

Organisers of a Gaza-bound flotilla carrying aid and pro-Palestinian activists have reported explosions and multiple drones that targeted some of their boats, currently situated ne
The vessels were aiming to deliver humanitarian aid to Gaza. The Israelis have asked that the aid be given to them to distribute.
titles: Gaza aid flotilla hit by drone attacks and explosions, activists say
Explosions and drones targeting Gaza aid flotilla boats, activists say
Aid Flotilla Headed for Gaza Says It’s Under Drone Attack
summary: Activists aboard the Global Sumud Flotilla, heading to Gaza with humanitarian aid, reported experiencing drone attacks and hearing explosions late Tuesday. This marks the third such incident this month. Despite these events, the organizers have stated they will not be intimidated. The Israeli authorities have requested that the aid intended for Gaza be handed over to them for distribution. The current status of the flotilla and its mission remains unchanged, continuing towards its destination.

title: Trump Cancels Meeting on Gov Shutdown, Blames Democrats
snippets: President Trump called off a planned Thursday meeting with top Hill Democrats to discuss a possible deal to avoid a shutdown. He called Democrats' demands "unserious." Democrats say he chickened out.

<a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikgFBVV95cUxOWDlTYlFqNlNRRTZVT294VTFRVGhrYlpoV3l5TDdnT0x3N1laNU5nTWFJUXlUOTFnRUpldHVFQ3NHNE1pYms4NXdjeWlWdFU3X3JySjBId3NXVVFFNzU0NTJRbkhBbjRfYnNTWHdoMEdvM2Y4eDlITlI3UEFKLUpCQ2I2OG5DSDJVR0VHblppMkREZw?oc=5" target="_blank">Trump cancels meeting with to
New York Democrats Sen. Chuck Schumer and Rep. Hakeem Jeffries say Trump will take the blame for a federal government shutdown if a deal can't be reached.
titles: Trump cancels meeting with Democrats as prospects for shutdown increase
Trump cancels meeting with top Democrats as shutdown looms - Axios
Trump cancels meeting with top Democrats as government shutdown looms
summary: Former President Donald Trump canceled a meeting aimed at preventing a federal government shutdown, blaming Congressional Democrats for the impasse. He accused them of losing their way in a post on Truth Social. New York Democrats Senator Chuck Schumer and Representative Hakeem Jeffries countered by stating Trump would be blamed for the shutdown, criticizing him for avoiding negotiations. The potential shutdown threatens federal workers' pay, air travel, and food stamp distribution.

title: OpenAI and Oracle Launch $500B Stargate AI Project in Texas
snippets: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiekFVX3lxTE10cjBrMDkxZWZWbU1jekZrN3RrVklkTldxWGJSMG44eEdOcmVicXhSTTgzNU4wNmIxdS1zSVNiN1JsbTRiSjFsNjktX19GMFdkdk1XQmdwWFprQ3kybUZzOGZhN3h0VGw3UmNJU3pfUi13ZTlfeEctbEZB?oc=5" target="_blank">OpenAI announces five new sites for Stargate data center projec
OpenAI and Oracle are betting big on America's AI future, bringing online the flagship site of the $500 billion Stargate program in Abilene, Texas.
OpenAI is continuing to build out massive AI data centers to train and serve increasingly powerful AI models.
titles: OpenAI announces five new sites for Stargate data center project - Axios
OpenAI's first data center in $500B Stargate project is open in Texas, with sites coming in New Mexico and Ohio
OpenAI is building five new Stargate data centers with Oracle and SoftBank
summary: OpenAI, in partnership with Oracle, has launched the flagship site of the $500 billion Stargate project in Abilene, Texas, marking a significant investment in the future of American AI. This initiative, which aims to expand AI data centers for training and deploying advanced AI models, will see its costs rise to $400 billion as it progresses.

The Cowboys have struggled, losing 11 of their last 12 games. The search for Gundy's replacement is underway, with the future direction of the program and its key players now a primary focus.

title: NASA's Artemis II to Orbit Moon in 2026, Eyes Lunar Landing in 2027
snippets: The crew of Artemis II will not land on the moon but will lay the groundwork for the first crewed missions to Mars.
NASA on Tuesday said it was on track to send astronauts to orbit the moon in early 2026, as the United States races China to return to the lunar surface.
"There is a desire for us to be the first to return to the surface of the Moon."
titles: NASA plans to send manned Moon mission by February 2026
NASA says on track to send astronauts around the Moon in 2026
NASA targeting early February for Artemis II mission to the Moon
summary: NASA announced plans for the Artemis II mission to orbit the Moon in early 2026, setting the stage for a lunar landing in 2027 and future crewed missions to Mars. This mission aims to establish groundwork for further space exploration as the US competes with China in returning to the lunar surface.

title: Trump Claims Resolution of Conflicts, Critiques Global Bodies at U.N.

He also criticized global institutions. The specifics of the conflicts or the nature of the criticism were not detailed in the provided content.

title: YouTube to Allow Banned Misinformation Channels to Seek Reinstatement
snippets: YouTube on Tuesday said it will allow previously banned accounts to apply for reinstatement, rolling back a policy that had treated violations as permanent.

Google has announced it will reverse a major content moderation decision: YouTube will offer channels that were banned for spreading covid and election misinformation in 2020 a pathway back onto the platform. In a letter sent to the House Judiciary Committee, Alphabet's lawyers claimed that the Bide
Alphabet blames the Biden administration for its moderation decisions.
titles: YouTube to allow creators banned for Covid-19, election misinformation to apply for reinstatement
YouTube will let creators who spread covid misinformation back on the site
YouTube will restore channels banned for COVID and election misinformation
summary: YouTube, owned by Alphabet, announced it will enable channels banned for spreading COVID-19 and election misinformation in 2020 to apply for reinstatement. This marks a reversal of its prior policy treating such violations as permanent. The decision was disclosed in a letter to the House Judiciary Committee, where Alphabet suggested the Biden administration influenced its moderation policies.

title: Shane Pinto Scores OT Winner, Senators Beat Maple Leafs 3-2 in Pre-Season
snippets: Shane Pinto scored a power-play goal with two minutes left in the third period to tie the game, then scored 16 seconds into overtime to win it as the visiting Ottawa Senators rallied to edge the Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 in NHL pre-season action at Scotiabank Arena on Tuesday.

Shane Pinto scored a power-play goal with two minutes left in the third period to tie the game, then scored 16 seconds into overtime to win it as the visiting Ottawa Senators rallied to edge the Toronto Maple Leafs 3-2 in NHL pre-season action at Scotiabank Arena on Tuesday.

Shane Pinto scored the game-tying goal with just over two minutes remaining in the third period and buried the overtime winner to lead the Ottawa Senators to a 3-2 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs.
titles: Pinto paces Senators to 3-2 win over Leafs in OT
Pinto paces Senators to overtime win over Maple Leafs
NHL Pre-Season Highlights: Senators 3, Maple Leafs 2 (OT)
summary: Shane Pinto led the Ottawa Senators to a 3-2 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs by scoring a power-play goal to tie the game with two minutes left in the third period and then netting the winning goal 16 seconds into overtime. The match took place at Scotiabank Arena during an NHL pre-season game on Tuesday.

title: Trump Criticizes EU Immigration Policy, Global Institutions at UN Assembly

title: Jonathan Toews Returns to NHL, Jets Fall 3-2 to Oilers in Preseason Game
snippets: Colin Miller and Colby Barlow scored the goals while Jonathan Toews played 18:36, winning just over half of his faceoffs.
Even though his Winnipeg Jets side lost 3-1 in pre-season action, Jonathan Toews got his first taste of NHL action in two-and-a-half years.
Ty Emberson, Isaac Howard and Quinn Hutson each scored and Matt Tomkins made 13 saves as the Edmonton Oilers narrowly beat the Winnipeg Jets, winning 3-2.
titles: Jonathan Toews makes preseason debut as Winnipeg Jets fall to Oilers 3-2
Jonathan Toews has quiet Jets pre-season debut
NHL Pre-Season Highlights: Oilers 3, Jets 2
summary: Jonathan Toews returned to NHL action after a two-and-a-half-year hiatus, playing 18:36 and winning just over half of his faceoffs in a preseason game where his team, the Winnipeg Jets, lost 3-2 to the Edmonton Oilers. Despite goals from Colin Miller and Colby Barlow for the Jets, the Oilers secured the win with goals from Ty Emberson, Isaac Howard, and Quinn Hutson, alongside 13 saves from Matt Tomkins.

title: Lowe Powers Red Sox to 4-1 Win Over Blue Jays; MLB Roundup
snippets: Nathaniel Lowe had RBI singles in the second and sixth innings as the Boston Red Sox earned a 4-1 win over the Toronto Blue Jays on Tuesday.
Nathaniel Lowe finished with two hits and two RBIs and Carlos Narváez hit a pivotal two-run double in the sixth inning to lead the Boston Red Sox to a 4-1 win over the Toronto Blue Jays.
Dominic Canzone hit a solo homer in the fifth and Josh Naylor hit a clutch three-run double in the eighth inning to elevate the Seattle Mariners to a 4-3 win over the Colorado Rockies.
Jeffery Springs pitched five innings of one-run ball and Jacob Wilson reached base four times as the Athletics handled the Houston Astros 5-1.
Francisco Lindor and Brandon Nimmo both drove in three runners on two hits as the New York Mets edged the Chicago Cubs 9-7. Nico Hoerner scored four runs on three hits in the loss.

Oneil Cruz blasted his 20th home run of the season to lift the Pittsburgh Pirates to a 4-2 victory over the Cincinnati Reds. Rookie Nick Yorke aided on offence, tallying two hits and an RBI in the win.
Heriberto Hernandez knocked a game-tying homer in the ninth and Xavier Edwards drove in the winning run as the Miami Marlins knocked off the Philadelphia Phillies 6-5 in extra innings.
Geraldo Perdomo hit a two-out, game-winning single in the ninth inning and the Arizona Diamondbacks recovered from an early four-run deficit to beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 5-4.
titles: Lowe lifts Red Sox over Blue Jays 4-1
MLB Highlights: Red Sox 4, Blue Jays 1
MLB Highlights: Mariners 4, Rockies 3
MLB Highlights: Athletics 5, Astros 1
MLB Highlights: Mets 9, Cubs 7
MLB Highlights: Pirates 4, Reds 2
MLB Highlights: Marlins 6, Phillies 5 (F/11)
MLB Highlights: Diamondbacks 5, Dodgers 4
summary: Nathaniel Lowe contributed with two RBI singles, leading the Boston Red Sox to a 4-1 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays. In other games, the Seattle Mariners edged out the Colorado Rockies 4-3, the Athletics defeated the Houston Astros 5-1, the New York Mets won against the Chicago Cubs 9-7, the Pittsburgh Pirates overcame the Cincinnati Reds 4-2, the Miami Marlins triumphed over the Philadelphia Phillies 6-5 in extra innings, and the Arizona Diamondbacks rallied to beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 5-4.

title: Skubal's Struggles Lead Tigers to 7th Straight Loss, Guardians Tie for First
snippets: Ace Tarik Skubal fell apart on the mound in Cleveland on Tuesday night and Detroit lost its seventh straight game, allowing the Guardians to catch the Tigers in the standings and secure the tiebreaker.

José Ramírez drove in a run with a swinging bunt when Cleveland rallied in a strange sixth inning against Detroit ace Tarik Skubal, and the Guardians beat the Tigers 5-2 on Tuesday night to move into a tie for first place in the AL Central.
titles: Skubal, Tigers collapse; caught by Guardians
Guardians down Skubal, Tigers to pull even atop AL Central
summary: On Tuesday night, Detroit Tigers' ace Tarik Skubal struggled on the mound, leading to a 5-2 loss against the Cleveland Guardians. This defeat marked the Tigers' seventh consecutive loss. During a pivotal sixth inning, José Ramírez's swinging bunt drove in a run, contributing to the Guardians' rally. The victory allowed the Guardians to tie with the Tigers for first place in the AL Central and secure the tiebreaker.

title: Yankees Secure Postseason Berth with 3-2 Win Over White Sox
snippets: José Caballero, acquired at the trade deadline to provide a versatile spark off the bench, swatted a two-out, walk-off single in the ninth inning Tuesday night against the White Sox to secure the Yankees their 60th postseason berth in franchise history.
Watch as New York Yankees infielder Jose Caballero hits a walk-off single against the Chicago white Sox to clinch a post-season berth for his team.
titles: Caballero's walk-off seals Yanks' 60th playoff berth
Yankees’ Caballero hits single to walk off White Sox and clinch playoff berth
summary: Jose Caballero's walk-off single scored Aaron Judge, leading the New York Yankees to a 3-2 victory over the Chicago White Sox, securing their postseason berth for the eighth time in nine seasons. This win marks the Yankees' 60th postseason appearance in team history.

title: Trump-Epstein Statue Installed on National Mall Sparks Reactions

titles: Satirical statue in DC notes ‘long-lasting bond’ between Trump, Epstein
New statue on National Mall celebrates ‘long-lasting bond’ between Trump and Epstein
summary: A bronze statue depicting Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein holding hands and frolicking has been installed on the east end of the National Mall in Washington DC. Created by an anonymous artist, the statue features both men with wide grins and a foot kicked back in joy, sparking reactions among residents and tourists.

title: U.N. Reports Trump's Stair Incident Tied to Safety Mechanism Activation

summary: An international body, identified as the U.N., reported that a sudden stop experienced by President Trump as he stepped on the stairs was likely due to the accidental activation of a built-in safety mechanism.

title: Colombia's Petro Seeks UN Probe into Trump Over Caribbean Strikes

Petro highlighted the death of "poor young people" in these strikes. The call for legal action follows Trump's declaration to eliminate drug trafficking threats.

Many doctors and scientists were reeling Monday after President Donald Trump went on TV to insist that pregnant women should never take Tylenol and revive debunked theories about vaccines and autism. titles: What we know, and don't, about the link between painkillers and autism
What we know about autism’s causes and any potential link to Tylenol
summary: President Donald Trump's statements on TV advising against the use of Tylenol by pregnant women and reviving debunked theories about vaccines and autism have sparked controversy. These statements go beyond the FDA's more cautious advice, leading to confusion and concern among doctors and scientists. There is a lack of scientific evidence to support the U.S. government's caution against Tylenol in pregnancy and the fast-tracking of an experimental autism medication.

title: Trump Labels Migration, Climate Change "Con Jobs" in UN Speech Amid Malfunctions
snippets: President Donald Trump, in a United Nations speech that lasted nearly an hour, criticized member nations on migration and called climate change a "con job."

Press secretary speculates the escalator stopped on purpose to humiliate president, but UN says safety function may have been ‘inadvertently triggered’

Donald Trump appeared to laugh it off Tuesday when an escalator and a teleprompter both malfunctioned during his United Nations visit – but
titles: Trump UN escalator snafu: White House wants investigation of sudden stop
Trump angered by ‘bad escalator’ at UN as White House vows to investigate malfunction
summary: President Donald Trump criticized migration and climate change as a "con job" in a nearly hour-long UN speech. An escalator and teleprompter malfunctioned during his visit, speculated by the press secretary as intentional to humiliate him. However, the UN suggested a safety function might have been inadvertently triggered. Trump appeared to laugh off the incidents.

title: Jessica Chastain's "The Savant" Pulled from Apple TV+ Schedule
snippets:
The Savant pulled from Apple TV+ release schedule ‘after careful consideration’

Jessica Chastain-led series The Savant has been pulled from the Apple TV+ release schedule.

The thriller was set to begin on 26 September but its release has been postponed.

The Savant, the upcoming Apple TV Plus show about law enforcement working to prevent domestic terrorism, was slated to premiere this Friday. But the streamer has quietly pulled the series from its release slate and it’s not clear if or when it will now debut. Based on Andrea Stanley’s 20
titles: Apple postpones Jessica Chastain series about domestic extremism
Apple TV Plus has quietly pulled its new show about domestic extremism
summary: The Savant, a thriller series led by Jessica Chastain and focused on preventing domestic terrorism, was scheduled to premiere on Apple TV+ on September 26. However, after careful consideration, the show has been removed from the release schedule, and it is currently unclear if or when it will debut.

title: Meta Launches Super PAC to Oppose AI Regulation Policies
snippets: Exclusive: Meta launches super PAC to fight AI regulation
Meta is investing 'tens of millions' into a new pro-AI super PAC called the American Technology Excellence Project to fight state-level tech policy that would regulate AI.
titles: Exclusive: Meta launches super PAC to fight AI regulation - Axios
Meta launches super PAC to fight AI regulation as state policies mount
summary: Meta has launched the American Technology Excellence Project, a super PAC, with an investment of 'tens of millions'. The purpose is to oppose state-level policies aimed at regulating AI technology.

title: Ex-Philippine President Duterte Arrested on ICC Warrant, Detained in Netherlands
snippets:
Three charges against Duterte stem from his years-long campaign against drug users and dealers that rights groups say killed thousands

International criminal court prosecutors have charged the former president of the Philippines Rodrigo Duterte with three counts of crimes against humanity o
International Criminal Court prosecutors allege that Rodrigo Duterte carried out crimes against humanity while in office, in pursuit of a brutal war on drugs.
titles: Rodrigo Duterte, former Philippines president, charged with crimes against humanity at ICC
Duterte, former Philippine president, charged with murder at ICC
summary: Former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte was arrested in March by local authorities on an International Criminal Court (ICC) warrant and is currently detained in the Netherlands. The ICC has charged Duterte with three counts of crimes against humanity related to his aggressive anti-drug campaign, which rights groups claim resulted in thousands of deaths.

title: NASA Picks 10 Astronauts for 2025 Class, Eyes Moon and Mars Missions
snippets: NASA has chosen 10 new astronaut candidates who will train for missions to the Moon and Mars. Their selection represents a powerful blend of talent and ambition, fueling humanity’s next great leaps into space.

NASA’s 2025 astronaut candidate class greets the crowd in this Sept. 22, 2025, image. The group was introduced Monday following a competitive selection process of more than 8,000 applicants from across the United States. The class now will complete nearly two years of training before becoming eligib
titles: 10 people who beat 8,000 others to become NASA astronaut candidates
NASA’s New Astronaut Candidates
summary: NASA selected 10 astronaut candidates from over 8,000 applicants for its 2025 class, introduced on Sept. 22, 2025. These candidates will undergo nearly two years of training for future Moon and Mars missions, marking a significant step in human space exploration.

title: Tech Leaders to Discuss AI, Space Economy, and Startups at TechCrunch Disrupt 20
snippets: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, True Anomaly’s Even Rogers and Vast’s Max Haot will join the Space Stage to explore what’s needed to unlock a sustainable and scalable space economy.

On the AI Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Mercor co-founder and CEO Brendan Foody will break down how artificial intelligence is transforming not just how we work, but also who gets to work in the first place.

Vinod Khosla, founder of Khosla Ventures, takes the Disrupt Stage for a candid fireside chat on AI, climate, healthcare, and transformational startups. Hear blunt, big-picture advice from one of tech’s most legendary investors, and learn what founders truly need to succeed in turbulent times.
titles: Building the new backbone of space at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
Mercor’s Brendan Foody breaks down AI’s impact on hiring at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
Vinod Khosla on AI, moonshots, and building enduring startups — all at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, leaders in technology and investment, including Even Rogers, Max Haot, Brendan Foody, and Vinod Khosla, will discuss key topics shaping the future. They'll cover the development of a sustainable space economy, the impact of AI on employment, and the role of startups in addressing major global challenges such as climate change and healthcare. The event aims to provide insights into creating successful ventures in a rapidly changing world.
